Class StudentGraph

java.lang.Object
StudentGraph
public class StudentGraph extends Object
This class creates the relationships between students as a weighted graph. Each student in a node , and the connection strength between two students is an edge with a corresponding weight. In addition, this component is critical for both pod formation and referral path finding.
Author:
Abdon Morales, am226923

  • Field Details

    • adjacencyList

      private Map<UniversityStudent, List<StudentGraph.Edge>> adjacencyList
      The adjacency list representing the graph structure. Maps each student to a list of edges connecting to their neighboring students.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentGraph

      public StudentGraph(List<UniversityStudent> students)
      This is the constructor method for the StudentGraph class. This initializes the graph structure and add all students to the graph
      Parameters:
      students - , the ArrayList<>() of (University) students.

  • Method Details

    • displayGraph

      public void displayGraph()
      This method prints out the student graph.

    • addEdge

      private void addEdge(UniversityStudent studentA, UniversityStudent studentB, int weight)
      This method's purpose is to add a weighted edge between two students and to ensure the graph is undirected by adding the edge in both directions.
      Parameters:
      studentA - is a UniversityStudent object and acts as a node between a weighted edge and another node (Student B).
      studentB - is a UniversityStudent object and acts as a node between a weighted edge and another node (Student A).
      weight - Is the weight of the edge between two nodes/students.

    • getNeighbors

      public List<StudentGraph.Edge> getNeighbors(UniversityStudent student)
      The purpose of this method is for it to be useful for traversal algorithms like Prim's Algorithm and Dijkstra's Algorithm.
      Parameters:
      student - the student we want to find the neighbors of.
      Returns:
      Return the List<Edge> of neighbors of the student.

    • getAllNodes

      public Set<UniversityStudent> getAllNodes()
      The purpose of this method is for it to be useful for initializing traversal algorithms.
      Returns:
      Return all of the nodes of the graph.
